content: Jan 15 BlackRock Inc  the world's largest money manager  reported a 3.3 percent fall in fourth-quarter profit as the company earned less from investment advisory performance fees.

title: BlackRock's quarterly profit falls 3.3 pct

content: NEW YORK Investors poured $102.8 billion in new money into BlackRock Inc's exchange-traded funds in 2014  setting a record in global flows for the iShares ETF business  the company said on Monday.
name: BlackRock Inc
title: BlackRock ETF funds draw record $102.8 billion in new money

content: BlackRock's mutual funds posted record inflows in 2014 of $18.9 billion  according to data provided to Reuters by Morningstar.
